org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api

Interface JSONSerializable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GadgetResource, GadgetSpec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGadgetResource, DefaultGadgetSpec, TempGadgetResource, TempGadgetSpec

    public interface JSONSerializable
    An object that can be represented as JSON.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONObject toJSON()
      Returns a JSON representation of this object.

    • Method Detail

      • toJSON

        org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONObject toJSON()
                                         throws org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONException
        Returns a JSON representation of this object.
        Returns:
        a JSONObject representation of this object
        Throws:
        org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONException - if there are errors building a JSON representation of this object
